body_html: Further note: It seems that this error only occurs when I'm passing the matrix into a function which then performs eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True). If I inline this code, the error doesn't occur. Very weird. Perhaps it has something to do with how matrices are being passed around?
body_text: Further note: It seems that this error only occurs when I'm passing the matrix into a function which then performs eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True). If I inline this code, the error doesn't occur. Very weird. Perhaps it has something to do with how matrices are being passed around?
body: Further note: It seems that this error only occurs when I'm passing the matrix _into_ a function which then performs `eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True)`. If I inline this code, the error doesn't occur. Very weird. Perhaps it has something to do with how matrices are being passed around?
